name: Ball-Z
description:
Zuma-like game. Destroy chains of balls of the same color as the one in your hands.

Controls:

Left mouse button, Spacebar - shoot ball.

Mouse movement left/right - move left/right.

Mouse movement forward/backward - look up/down.

Enter - start game (after loading).

Escape - exit game.

Source code

Requirements:

OpenGL 4.1 compatible videocard and driver
